website_summaries.verdict: This massager utilizes a combination of heat and multiple rollers to work out knots and relieve tension.
pros: Heat helps penetrate stiff muscles and soothe aches and pains
Can be used on range of problem areas
Armrest straps allow for optimal positioning
Safely shuts down after 15 minutes of use
Comes with both AC and car adapter for portability
cons: Without the protective layer of a towel or clothing, heat can become intense

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I recommend to anyone who suffers from a lazy husband that won't give shoulder massages.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I have migraine headaches and a lot of tension in my shoulders, neck and back. I was afraid this would be too intense but it's perefect. Not too hard and not to light. I thought it maybe awkward the way you Hold your arms in the slings but it is not. Love this massager!!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Just AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday and used it for about an hour last night. Oh My God. It is absolutely amazing. It rubbed out a few knots in my back and then I layed it down on my bed and it rubbed my legs and it just about put me to sleep. My boyfriend came in and he stole it from me, so now I'm thinking I will buy another one so we can both have one because I really don't like sharing this thing.
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable customer service!! I purchased this a couple months ago and have been enjoying the unit a great deal. Unfortunately, the AC adapter started shorting out. I sent an email notifying them of the problem. Within just a few days I received a priority box with a new adapter.
customer_reviews.author: mr metropaulitan

customer_reviews.title: Grest message just be sure to wear a shirt!
customer_reviews.text: this is great! it gets the deep knots out that my tennis ball can't reach! I love it! UPDATE: this companies customer service is amazing!!! Thank you! Five S! Great Job!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sweetland

customer_reviews.title: This really impressed me
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a massager online but I guess I wanted to try anything at this point because the tension in my neck was so bad! I am using it right now for the first time and it's amazing. Just the right pressure and hitting all the spots that I have knots in, it's very warm, I wouldn't say 'hot' though. I can't wait to use this every night to relax!!! I am so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shepard

customer_reviews.title: The massager works great! It's been able to help make me feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic severe migraines and I also was recently in a car wreck. I bought this to help with pain in my neck and back due to both the wreck and my migraines. The massager works great! It's been able to help make me feel a bit better. The heat option doesn't get that hot for me, but I am used to using really hot heating pads for my neck because of migraines, so it's most likely just a personal preference. Over all I love this product and I just hope it stays working for years to come. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Used it three times in two weeks, no longer than 10 minutes each time, and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I know I didn't pay a lot of money for this massager but I expected a little longer use. I don't know how to contact the seller so I chose to write this rating. I made the purchase in November, 2017. I used it a for a couple of months and then laid it aside. I chose to pick it up and try to use it a few days ago (11-2018) but it would not turn on. Very disappointed because I really could have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in April and used it once. Put it away for the summer and just got it back out of the box. It will not turn on or work. Don’t waste your money. Very disappointed in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Hashemi

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory...
customer_reviews.text: This massage pillow is great in theory, but in reality it is too large and unwieldy to be able to use comfortably. Either you can sit up against it and have the kneaders jamming painfully into your back, or you can sit hunched over, pulling on the grips so the kneaders are flush against your back, which is also uncomfortable. More work and hassle than anything, and not relaxing at all. I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ) I've always had a terrible neck and when it gets "out"
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me one of these for mother's day and when my mother came to visit, I told her to try it out. We ordered her one immediately. It'll knock the knots out of your neck and kind of gives you a little adjustment. Strong rollers. You can control the pressure (and therefore, the level of "adjustment" you're signing up for.) I've always had a terrible neck and when it gets "out", nothing but a chiropractor visit fixes it. This buys me some time. For sure.
customer_reviews.author: 1artsyfartsy

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. Big relief for my shoulders and neck. The straps are small but it gives you a big time massage. The heat function is not at all worth writing about, but totally worth the price. I have been using it for a couple of months. I sleep much better now.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Sawhney

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting at work all day, counting the minutes until I could go home and use this. I cannot tell you how much I love it. I've broken many joints and have issues with chronic pain. My boyfriend was actually worried about what I was doing because of the moaning and groaning he heard from the other room. But I can tell you that my shoulder feels significantly better! This will definitely be a daily massager for me! Hopefully it stands the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: Jaki M

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis sufferer (and everyone else!)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I got it for my mom for Mother's Day because she struggles with arthritis, other alignment issues, and travels a ton (like 40% of the time) for work. It is a HARD pressure, but it feels sooooo good. The heat is definitely a nice addition. She absolutely loves this and uses it all over her body, including neck, shoulders, back, arms, legs, and especially around her knees. I want to buy another for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pfeil

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when it was working but it just stopped working after about 6 months. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massager that can be adjusted to massage any aching body part
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar massager at our local county fair, but this was much cheaper and works just as well! My husband uses it all the time when he's sore from exercising or just from having a long day. I like that you can adjust it to massage any part of your body. This massager works very well and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MerrY RevieWer

customer_reviews.title: Hand held, but you can still relax while you hold it!
customer_reviews.text: Best massager! I have purchased a lot of these and I really like this one. You can rest your hands inside the loops and control this and actually relax at the same time. What a great idea! Love this item! You can position it anywhere quite easily. The balls do heat up after a while but it takes some time. Automatically shuts off if you use it for a long time (I guess it thinks you walked away). Which is great if you did walk away. And if you are still using it no problem, just a button push to restart.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great seller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have pain all over my lower back and now upper back. This works great, I used it so much I wore it out in just 5 months. I sent a message to the seller about the wear and tear I put on it, and they sent me a brand new one. With out any more questions.They stand behind their products and really make it easy with the warranty they have in place. Less than a weeks time since I wrote to them I am getting the new one. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: seachick3

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts 6 month, and then stops working....
customer_reviews.text: This neck massager works okay! But I got it in June, and stoped working in Dec, only lasts 6 months. Not sure if it’s replaceable w 3 years warranty as it says?
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Lee

customer_reviews.title: Little concerned about durability but works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my legs and my wife's shoulders. Little concerned about durability but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Quadcopter flyer

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have used it over a shirt and on bare skin with no issues. The heat takes a little while but the friction provides some minor heat production. I like it so much that I let my co-worker use it. He immediately ordered one for his mom for Christmas. He told me today she loves it. It does automatically shut off after about fifteen minutes but if you try to restart it too many times back to back it won't turn on. I don't get the feeling this is a defect. It seems like a safety feature since it advises not to exceed a certain time limit overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man!!! My wife and I LOVE this thing! My wife bought this on a whim and boy was it worth every penny. We use it all the time. The only thing that I do not like is all the reviews that talk about burns from the heating mechanism. Because of that, we do not use the heating at all. Despite that, this thing is marvelous. It has different directions for the massage, different speed settings, etc. Overall, very impressed and very happy. We have been using it twice a day (once each) several times a week and it still looks like new (about six months now). So durability seems to be quite good as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Ash

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Sure giving massages are fantastic when you're a newly wed but after 10 years, dang my hands hurt and I've other stuff to do. My wife loves it however... maybe too much... She just took it on a vacation to Cancun, and left me here -- hey wait. Maybe I should lose the power supply and just start giving massages again.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Rough & painful to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my adult daughter who has back and neck muscle issues she gave it a decent try but it was so painful to use she stopped. It is too “rough” and actually hurt her. Took her over a week to recover from the pain it inflicted. It’s hard and knobby .
customer_reviews.author: skull

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how this felt--almost like human hands. Yes, it can hurt a bit, but not when compared to what my chiropractor inflicts on me! My only complaint is that the bi-directional feature is not automatic like the majority of others. I've actually ordered one with that feature and will return this one if I find it to be truly advantageous. After FOUR HOURS of reviewing massagers, however, I can tell you that this one has the longest power cord out there, which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: janet e.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness...how have we been without this?! The muscles in my neck and shoulders are often tight and uncomfortable, I can place this massager exactly where I need it to work and it is as good as going to the spa. The quality is excellent, appears to be nice soft leather but don't find confirmation of this on the packaging, regardless, good quality, you can change the rotation, add heat and change the pressure of the massage. Comes with both a wall plug and a car adapter which is nice for traveling. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGal820

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I get extreme neck and shoulder pain and using a handheld massager was making it worse when trying to keep it lifted. I found this and am so pleased. I’m able to just sit there and not worry about me doing any of the work and it really works all your kinks out. I use it multiple times a week on my neck, shoulders, back and even my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Might Leave My Hubby for This
customer_reviews.text: Actually, we both love it. It's worth every penny. When I lean against it, I can get to the spot where sciatica in my husband's back is most uncomfortable. We use it pretty much daily for 15 minutes on each other. But it's easily used alone. The arm holders are helpful. It's great for my knee, IT band problems on my leg, lower back pain, and neck -- really anywhere you need deep tissue or light massage. I have to be gentle on my neck but it does bring a lot of relief. This is probably our best purchase all year. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Flow

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for a gift-going to buy one for myself now
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for my mom who frequently has tight neck muscles. She seemed to enjoy the massager and liked that you can use it on different parts of your body for a massage (massage lower back, etc). I tried it myself too and thought it provided a good massage. I like that you can increase how intense the massage is by pulling more or less on the arm straps. The adapter cord that comes with it is ok in length-made to use fairly close to an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Garrott

customer_reviews.title: Buy it NOW. Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Omg, where has this been all of my life?! Wow. Shoulders, neck, base of skull, calves, feet are all I e tried so far and WOW. I have tension headaches and migraines and all the the places listed above are always in need of a ton more relief then my poor husband’s hands can provide. Even prof massages don’t provide long lasting relief, this can be used whenever and is amazing. I’m using it on my feet as I type and I don’t think they’ve ever been rubbed like this worth waaaay more than it costs.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: ... first if you’ve never used a shiatsu massager before like me, but then I got used to it ...
customer_reviews.text: It hurt at first if you’ve never used a shiatsu massager before like me, but then I got used to it and it really does work well. You can massage more than just your neck and shoulders. You can massage your arms, legs, and back as well. The only problem I had was wanting to use it for too long on one spot which is not a good idea because you’ll end up getting bruised and sore, lol. I only wish that it worked for hands and feet too but that would be too much to ask for, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, good price
customer_reviews.text: Ahh this thing feels so great! The massage ball things are actually pretty big, so they really feel like they knead deep. The settings are simple, and the materials feel soft and well made. It's comfortable to use, especially with the arm slings. It has to be plugged in to use but the cord is super long so I don't find it to be an issue. It runs in 15 minute intervals and can go forward or reverse. The heat gets to a nice toasty temp, but not hot enough to hurt. I only wish it had the option to do heat only with no kneading.
customer_reviews.author: Michell

customer_reviews.title: What you’ve been missing your whole life!
customer_reviews.text: I had a $120 massage recently. I asked for them to focus on my hip/glutes and they claimed to have “ran out of time.” Well, laying on my side in my recliner with this bad boy, with heat, has saved me! No more broken promises! Thanks to everyones reviews I bought it and had it delivered the next day. Within hours I had relief on my knees, thighs, gkutes, hips, calves and hammies. Ong...so much relief! Thank you to whomever created this. Its the absolute best!
customer_reviews.author: KB Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, definitely my favorite massager
customer_reviews.text: Great product, definitely my favorite massager! After a few month use it wore a small hole in the fabric and the spinning part got snagged on it, I contacted customer service and they're sending me a new one right way - so, great customer service too. Highly recommend both product and seller! Update 5/17 Had another issue with the knobs not spinning, they again were great with their customer service! And the product itself is the best foot massager I've ever had, and the best back massager, so can't lose with this one from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: tad bjorlie

customer_reviews.title: Great neck massager!
customer_reviews.text: I often get neck and shoulder aches that turn into bad headaches so purchased this for relief during those times. This massager has built in heat which is awesome. The heat doesn't get too hot at all and can't burn you as some of the reviews suggested. I would describe the heat as warm. The item has a built in 15 minute timer so it will automatically turn off after that time limit. You can restart it if desired. This is a great product that does what it state it does. I've only had it a few weeks but haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: dsgnr

customer_reviews.title: Great initial buy, but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: While this product was great in the beginning: strong motor, long cables, quality vinyl and stitching, 12v car adapter... I can't really recommend it, because of the lack of longevity. After using it for 2 months the motor is pretty much shot. There are a ton of different versions of this product on amazon at different price points. 3 of my friends have variations and they are all pretty much the same. If you are looking for a quick fix for a sudden muscle spasm then sure, buy one. But, if you're looking for a long term stress reliever I'd look at something more expensive with a better quality motor.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Yesss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because sometimes I want my shoulders and neck rubbed and my husband is JUST NOT HAVING IT. Wow! After reading the reviews I was kind of skeptical because it said it doesn't do deep tissue or anything, but it gave me the best neck and shoulder rub I've had in a long time. My only gripe is you cant control the speed and there aren't any additional 'massage' motion setting to choose from. It still works great and definitely helped me sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: S J J

customer_reviews.title: helping to alleviate pain from RA
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 20 year old relative with RA (rheumatoid arthritis). She's been in a lot of pain... shoulders, hips, knees, jaw and hands. She tells me she's been using it in various places...works on shoulders... but really helping her hips and knee joints by using it in a recliner. It was a great purchase for her.
customer_reviews.author: MoeH

customer_reviews.title: My error ... Missing car adapter?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit bulky but feels great! I think that will take getting used to. I sure felt the difference and can save $$$ from getting professional massagers. Previous review my mistake: It was in the box. Though I am still unsure if it was a returned item. The car charger was in the box. It may have received a returned device? It looked strange in the box and there’s no “car adapter” I thought it came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit because I loved my first unit so much and I know I over used it. I used it everyday for over a year and for extended periods of time and it never failed me. I'm Healing from a herniated and a bulging disc and this massager helps soften the tension in my upper trapezius muscles. I think my very very excessive use caused the AC Adapter to malfunction, or burn out, but the company is so gracious and is allowing me to keep my old unit and the new unit. They are also issuing a refund. Amazing Customer Service. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gregory

customer_reviews.title: This really helps with neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these and I still use my first one all of the time. It has a very powerful motor so you can massage as hard as you want to. Of course you should start out slow and work up to the deep tissue. The heat feels great, especially in the winter time. You can reverse direction and choose the direction that feels best to you.
customer_reviews.author: biglefti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have tried a few of these and this is my second purchase of this product. My last one lasted 2 years before i broke it by accidentally dropping it. It is very powerful so be careful with the pressure you apply. This is why this product is better than the others on the market. Most of these when you try to get deep in your muscles will just stop but this has a motor strong enough to really get in there for me. This is the only model i have found effective at dealing with my shoulder issues.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas. He’s hard to buy for, but he loves this. He uses it every morning and it has helped relieve a lot of his neck pain. I used it too and it is easy to use and you can change how much pressure you want by pulling on the little handles. It doesn’t really heat up fast so don’t get it if you’re super excited about that. Also my mom couldn’t use it because it was to rough for her but she is SUPER sensitive. I’d say for the average person the pressure is perfect (and like I said, you can change it to suit your comfort level).
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Husband's bday gift but wife is the most happiest
customer_reviews.text: I bougth this as a birthday present for my husband. Let me tell you Im the most happy with this purchase, I just love it, I usually give him a massage with my hands when I know that he is tired after work (he has to drive along ways very often) but we have a baby that requires a lot attention and work. So I decided to buy this product because I dont have much time to pamper my husband, We just absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Flores

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The massager has a problem turning on. You can hear the motor trying to run, but the knobs won't turn. After pressing on/off multiple times and manually twisting the knobs, it'll start working again. Also, the heating function doesn't work. The fabric is also pretty rough, so it's not pleasant to use on bare skin (back/leg).
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I am getting the massages my body longed for lol! I think it does the best job on the neck and shoulders. The rotating thingies are spaced just right to grip your neck and give your chills! It's good on my lower back as well. I have only had it one day but I will update this later. One more thing, the heat level is just perfect no fear of burning.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya A

customer_reviews.title: Fabric wears easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a year ago and it lasted for a long time, then the fabric tore beyond repair. I use this thing daily for hours at a time for chronic pain, so I figured that a year is about right and didn't want to try patching the fabric in case it caused problems. Luckily I bought a second one for my mom and she didn't like it so I started using that one expecting about a year out of it, but I've only been using it a month and I can already see the fabric weakening.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and this is the only Massager I have ever found that actually works, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: CBallard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for neck pain and knots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for christmas and I got to try it. I love it more than I ever have, or ever will, love another human. It's quite strong and it actually got rid of knots in my neck! The only annoying thing about it is the wire you have to leave plugged in. I'm thinking about getting another one for me.
customer_reviews.author: jtilton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Brookstone shiatsu massager just like this one for $150+. I loved it, used it almost every day for 2 month and it broke. This one costs a lot less and essentially is the same...I don't feel any difference at all
customer_reviews.author: yelena orlova

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I am a disabled vet who suffers from chronic pain in my lower and upper spine due to degenerative disks as well as bulging disks. Yesterday I had some extreme body pains throughout my back, neck and legs so I ordered this to see how it works. It arrived next day and I immediately used it. I feel amazing! I could literally feel this thing kneading out the knots in my shoulders and back. It was a good pain then it was simply a great massage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Poor woman's massage
customer_reviews.text: I'm a poor nurse anesthetist student. So I essentially have negative munnies now. I used to get Thai massages at least once a month but now that I'm broke, I bought this as an investment (hehe) to help with the aching from craning my neck and back while studying all day. So far I'm liking it. I do feel like the buttons are rather sensitive... It sometimes it goes off on its own if I pick it up without pressing any buttons, or will turn itself off spontaneously. But I enjoy using this on my neck, back, and even calves (AMAZING). The heat function is a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: tofu princess

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: My neck and shoulders renewed after 3rd day use that valuable massager. I can't believe it, it's more powerful than human hands and you can regulated yourself where to move and push to the pain point. My opinion it's much better, then massage chair, because it's portable and you can use on the legs, feet's and shoulders all around. Very satisfied. Thanks to the Five Star for great massager. Thanks to Amazon for excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Elika Free

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully and is Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My not so delicate boyfriend is who I purchased this for. I figured at the price it would probably only last a couple of months, but was worth it for the price. I was soooooo wrong! We've had it 9 months now, and it is holding up wonderfully! He says it helps so much not just on his back, but for his neck as well. This was such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing utility. I have purchased three as gifts and one for myself. My friends all love it and they continue to thank me for it as its the gift that keeps on giving. I use it all the time and highly recommend every household own one. Amazing for pain relief and for a good old fashion rub down. Allows you to hit almost every spot on your back and delivers a good amount of power. A+
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Tilleard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in every way
customer_reviews.text: I have very frequent neck pain that is hard to massage on my own. This can get in that spot and release the tension. I no longer have to bug my husband to massage my neck! I also have scoliosis and have frequent lower back pain that is too painful to massage. I have found that using this just above where my pain is can really lessen the intensity. I wish I had this when I was pregnant!! The heat doesn't really do much for me, I could take or leave that feature. The cord is nice and long so you don't have to sit right next to an outlet. I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: SVANDAMME

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law. She visited our house recently and her neck was bothering her. I let her use the shiatsu massager just like this one that I have. She liked it so much that I immediately bought one and sent it to her. She loves it! So do I!
customer_reviews.author: Mamasgottools

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS.  It releases those knots right out of my neck
customer_reviews.text: I love my massager! The first couple of times I used it, I got sore. But, that means it is getting rid of the nasty stress knots in my neck and shoulders. Using the arms to push the kneaders in more, you feel like a person is giving you the deep muscle massage. It has a car plug to go with it but I haven't tried it in my car yet. I don't write very many reviews, but I thought this one deserved a mention.
customer_reviews.author: Loved it anyway

customer_reviews.title: Deep  massage !
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased so I did not have to go to get a massage when the upper part of my neck was really tight. I is very worth the price and patience to receive it. My husband really likes it. Once you get it positioned where the pain is it works fabulous.! Just alittle awkward. YES< I would refer it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: All Access Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY OWN neck massager!
customer_reviews.text: My own neck massager! This one sent chills down my spine it feels so good. Has helped my neck pain. I will say I do it more than many probably will, I keep pressing the button to have it turn on again. I love it and also use on legs. I did get sore the next day but that's because I tend to overdo it. If you don't have a good human who can massage you, then get this thing! Helps the traps and shoulders so much.
customer_reviews.author: LoraX

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I was worried I wouldn’t get enough use out of this but it is so amazing, everyone wants to constantly use it. The heat is perfect, really warms up the area being worked. The reverse option helps keep things open and not always the same motion. Really enjoy it! I do wish I didn’t have to stay plugged in while I use it but that’s not a huge concern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied with this. I received this gift for mother's day from my husband and daughters and It has taken away all my aches and pains. I even brought it to work and used it there and encouraged a fellow friend/coworker to purchase one (which she did that same day). Definitely recommend this to anyone that is experiencing neck or back pain. This gives you that massage that you need and want from those expensive chairs, all at a low price and the comfort of your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This was used for massaging the neck.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because it dug to hard into the neck and didn't feel very comfortable. Plus, I woke up very sore.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for knots in the shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this option to replace a different massager I had that broke. This one has done me well for a while now. I love using it after a long day at work as I get these huge knots in my shoulder that are hard to get with just a friends help. I'm able to control the pressure by slightly pulling on the hand slots. It's a great product after a stressful day and my husband and family like to steal it from me and use it too. Overall great pressure and usability for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Panthea

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase after realizing I really need a massage but was unlikely to feel comfortable going to a spa during the pandemic. I did a bit of research & for the price, I decided it was worth a try. I am so glad I made this purchase! it is very easy to use & after one use (15 minutes) I noticed a difference in my neck & shoulders (including around my shoulder blades). I am looking forward to using this on a regular basis - especially at the end of a long day WFH.
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldCityGirl

customer_reviews.title: Helps my tight neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly helpful massager. My neck and shoulders get so tight which can be very painful. This massager does a great job getting rid of knots and pain. In the past I’d have to get neck and shoulder massages so I am saving money with this massager.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A good rub down
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical about this product. I debated for a long time whether or not to buy it, but I’m glad I did. I only use it about once a week. It is NOT the same as having a massage at a spa, but definitely helps loosen up tight muscles. I would definitely recommend this product. I took off a star because it is a little difficult to maneuver on other places besides your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Maamborn

customer_reviews.title: I really like this massager
customer_reviews.text: I really like this massager. You can set it on your shoulders and lean back into a chair to put however much pressure you want to get a good neck and shoulder massage. You can also lay or sit on a flat surface and place your leg over it to use it as a leg massager.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo Robotico

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but good for fibro pain
customer_reviews.text: It is a good bit heavier than i expected, so as another reviewer mentioned it may not be good for those with muscle weakness. It is, however, an absolute lifesaver for my fibromyalgia pain, which is often focused and intense on certain places on my back. The straps allow me to really accurately position the pressure right where I need it. The heat also seems to sit at a good, not-too-hot temperature. Only real downside for me is that it is surprisingly ugly haha
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love Love. If you like neck massages and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love. If you like neck massages and don't like asking people to give you one often, this is for you. The rolling balls go two different directions. There is a heat option available. This is essential just like the one from Brookstone, but much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: major_critic.deal_lover

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhh, yeahhhhh!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars I would. I ordered this for my wife for our anniversary. Delivery was unexpectedly fast, so two thumbs up for that. Since she was at work, I thought I'd try it out. I was pleased with the high quality packing material and I thought, "Wow, if they used an actual strong fiber bag instead of disposable foam, I can't wait to see what's inside." I was not disappointed. This device is very well made and comfortable. I turned it on and thoroughly enjoyed the massage. It got all my "spots" and made my hair stand on end...ahhhhh! This is one of the best things I've bought on Amazon. I know she'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: ShadeTree

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh what pain relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product every person should have handy to ease any muscle pain or strain with deep tissue slow rolling motion it is worth every cent must buy this model for best results! I have tried the other models and thia one is best!
customer_reviews.author: vivian robinson

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! You won't regret it! Your neck and shoulders will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I have awful tension headaches and carry an enormous amount of stress in my neck and shoulders (like most people!). My husband laughed when I pulled this thing out of the box but OH MY WORD it is amazing! I use it almost daily right before I go to sleep. It really gets in there and does a deep massage so it can hurt if you can't handle the pressure in that area but if you can, you won't regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Acarleenb23

customer_reviews.title: Best shoulder massager out there
customer_reviews.text: The best amazon purchase I’ve made all year. I am a teacher on my feet all day, get migraines, back pain, and stomach pain. It’s great quality and and super deep tissue. I use it everywhere on my body and have such relief of pain with it. It has become particularly invaluable since I became pregnant. I used at least twice a day. I have two other shoulder massagers that don’t even come close to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh!  So nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful massager!!! Bought it for a Christmas present for my husband who has neck/back issues and he loves it. I love it too. :) It feels like someone is actually massaging my neck/back. My friend was visiting and I had her try it. She loved it so much she ordered one for herself before her massage was finished!
customer_reviews.author: SSW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My cervical vertebra is always uncomfortable, it improves my problem very well.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these things!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is perfect for digging into your back pain. All you have to do is place it on the knot in your back, turn it on and it gets right to work. It really is effective at releasing tension. It's amazing what a difference this massager can make. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this massager.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer joint and muscle point due to medical conditions. This massager has made me comfortable and I like that I can use it on all major areas. I receive trigger point injections and PT but needed something between these appts. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Lou

customer_reviews.title: Recently stopped working :/
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife exactly a year ago today. She loved it, and used it nearly every night. Unfortunately, about two weeks ago, the power switch began to short out. When held at the right angle, I could get it to work for about ten-fifteen seconds. After about two days, however, this stopped working (as shorts usually do), and the machine is now completely inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for sore shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the cost, it works wonderfully to relax my neck and shoulders at the end of the day. Plus I can even angle it to work on the rest of my back. I let my massage therapist friend use it and she immediately asked where I got it so she could get one too. It is very large and a bit heavier than I expected, but they don't get in the way of how well it works so I don't count them as negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: It really feels like a massage from a masseuse
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a birthday gift. It really feels like a massage from a masseuse. The heat option does wonders for my muscle tension headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Molly25

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate for some relief in my neck. This really seems to be helping. It feels just like someone is behind me massaging my neck and the hand loops allow me to put more or less pressure on the area and move It where I need it. I am using it on low setting and it provides just the right amount of pressure. Have only had it for a couple of days but already noticing a difference.
customer_reviews.author: monika m

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. I carry stress in my shoulders causing large knots and this really works. It it is built really well with strong materials. I not only use if for my shoulders but all around my back. The place that you put your arms to create pressure is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Antera

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Saw a similar product being hawked at our state fair for $140! Glad I didn't fall victim to their hype by waiting to see what Amazon had to offer. Feels good, I like the flexibility of moving around to different parts of your body. Don't pull too hard or overdo it; you'll end up hurting more than when you started!
customer_reviews.author: Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Better than a massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I tried this at my friend's apartment and was so blown away that I bought one on the spot. It's AMAZING. You can actually hear it massaging the knots out of your back. I get professional massages often, but that's stressful because you don't know if they'll be any good... this is cheap and reliable and incredible. No stress. I just recommended it to another friend and she bought it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Banishes Neck Pain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been told I make too many creepy noises when using this. Really helps with neck pain! This gets regular usage after a long day at work. If you’re on the fence, buy it, it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sad Panda

customer_reviews.title: A+++++ AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I have fibromyalgia and cervical spine pain (surgery 10 yrs ago failing). I chose to get off of narcotics 5 yrs ago when it stopped helping my pain. A few days ago I was desperate for relief. My pain level through the roof. Massage is the only real relief when it gets this bad. It was delivered today, SUNDAY! I just cannot express loudly enough the relief I have after only 30 minutes! The quality is outstanding too. Thank you!!!! I am telling everyone I know that suffers from chronic pain. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 3 years. Still the best purchase I’ve ever made. I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Durability is a problem
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. But after some time, the buttons stop working. I can’t not turn in it anymore. I opened the control panel and found the electric wire was very thin and delicate. The wire was broken. But I used it very gently, never in a rough way. I feel disappointed about it durability.
customer_reviews.author: S. L

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy it for a year (or less)
customer_reviews.text: I had the massager for about a little over a year. I didn’t use it every day, perhaps once a week. About 10 months in I noticed the buttons were sometimes not working, soon after I could no longer switch the direction and now the power button isn’t working. No power = no massage. I would take my money elsewhere and perhaps get a higher quality massager if you can. Otherwise, enjoy the year.
customer_reviews.author: Ilithia

customer_reviews.title: Find a better one
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but it’s not comfortable to use too big
customer_reviews.author: Karyz

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have back, shoulder, and neck pain from sitting in front of the computer for long period of hours. I've gone to the chiropractor and gotten massages from a masseuse, but this machine has definitely been cheaper to alleviate my pains. This was worth every penny, and it was the fraction of the price compared to more expensive name brands. I came back searching to buy for my boyfriend and friend as a gift, but looks like they're out of stock right now. :(
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Neck Massager
customer_reviews.text: This massager is in great!! I sit all day and I really wreaks havoc on my neck and shoulders and lower back. This thing gets the kinks out in no time! I love that it has varying speeds and direction control. Also, sometimes it gets a little too warm, so I like that the heat can be turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Sue

customer_reviews.title: I love this massager
customer_reviews.text: I use this when my neck and upper back get really tight. It heats the muscles, and massages them out. Just make sure to have cloth between the heat and your skin. If it's directly on skin it can get a little hot and make your skin red.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hassett

customer_reviews.title: Soreness go away!
customer_reviews.text: bought my husband one, we liked it so much, turned around and had one sent to my son for his birthday. He is an active trainer and cross fitter and ....Now I discover he uses it almost every day. So I am guessing....we all like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lil'J

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this product is worth every penny. Long story short, I brought this for my husband for Father's Day in 2018. After almost two years I have nothing to complain about. Even if it would break down today I will still be satisfied with my purchase. Worth every penny and will buy again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $49 I've Spent In A While
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This Shiatsu Massager far exceeded my expectations! Being able to position it so easily with your hands in the straps is the key. The knots in my neck are finally gone. This is the best $49 you can spend if you have any neck or back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think it was going to be that great but after using it on my neck, back, legs, and even feet I felt a lot better. Love that it has a heat setting on it. I even felt less stress after using it. The arm straps are little awkward to use at first but helps by adjusting how intense the strength of it is. It’s very strong so it was helpful that I could adjust it to be softer or stronger myself. I really liked being able to alternate the motion if the kneading and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We first ordered this product back in July 2018 and used it for four months and it was heaven for both my husband my back problems. It stopped working due to a loose wire so I wrote an email to the company and they instantly made things right and we are so happy...great customer service and product. We use this massager everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FIVE S FS8801 Deep Tissue 3D Kneading Shiatsu Neck, Shoulder, Back, Leg and Foot Massager Pillow with Heat, Beige
feature_bullets: Note: This is not cordless. There is no battery in it. It must be plugged in for it to work.

8 deep-3D-Rotation kneading Shiatsu massage nodes. Soothing heat function. Overheat protection and automatic shut off in 15 minutes. 3 speeds or intensities (low, medium, high). 2 massage directions. The convenient arm loops allow you to control how much pressure is applied to your body as well.

The combination of massage and heat therapy will help increase blood circulation and relieve muscle soreness, pain, stiffness, tension and stress. This massager can be used for various parts of your body such as neck, shoulders, back, abdomen, arms, thighs, calves and feet. FIVE S FS8801 is just what you need after a hard day's work to relax, from your neck, all the way down to your feet.

Premium PU leather and soft mesh material. Durable and high quality. Easy to clean. An AC adapter (110-220v AC) and a car adapter are included, so you can conveniently take the massager anywhere with you, at home, in the office, or in the car. Great gift idea.
UL listed. 3 year warranty. Return within 30 days. Satisfaction guaranteed.
